title: Interprofessional Workshop for Reducing Stigma of Substance Use Disorder (SUD)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical/counseling knowledge or leadership experience within an organization
context.additional_context: Online workshop conducted in smartphone-based, limited-technology environments, focusing on practical competency-building to reduce SUD-related stigma for learners in managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners can explain the causes and consequences of SUD stigma and propose at least three prevention strategies within organizations.
Learners can practice effective communication skills with individuals with SUD experiences through role-playing and case analysis.
Learners reduce the social distance index toward SUD patients (based on Shatterproof criteria) by at least 25% three months after completing the workshop.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
